sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STEWARTI A, in botany : A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of monodelphia , and order of polyandria ; and in the natural ſyſtem ranging under the 37th order, Columniferae. The calyx is simple ; the ſtyle is ſimple, with a quinquefid ſtigma ; the apple is without juice, quinquelobed, monospermous, burſting open with a ſpring five ways. There is only one ſpecies, the malacodendron, which is a foreign plant.
